Hello new readers! This blog will be focused on my efforts developing a functional neural network. I’ve had limited exposure to neural networks in the past feel that this area is one needing strengthening. I will use a neural network to predict a numeric value such as: age, income, or price. The model’s accuracy will be evaluated using an r-squared value and mean of the square (RMSE).
